definition: the act of giving a false appearance
details:
noun
- the act of giving a false appearance
= synonyms: pretence, pretending, simulation, feigning
- an artful or simulated semblance
= synonyms: pretence, guise, pretext
- a false or unsupportable quality
= synonyms: pretence, pretension
- imaginative intellectual play
= synonyms: pretence, make-believe
- pretending with intention to deceive
= synonyms: pretence, feigning, dissembling
